title: Russian envoy to UN dies in New York | World news | The Guardian
text:
Russian envoy to UN dies in New York 
Vitaly Churkin died one day before 65th birthday, says Russian foreign ministry Vitaly Churkin at the Syrian ceasefire press conference at the UN headquarters in New York in December 2016. Photograph: Pacific/Rex/Shutterstock View more sharing options Close Monday 20 February 2017 17.42 GMT 
Russia’s ambassador to the UN, Vitaly Churkin, has died in New York , the Russian foreign ministry has said. 
It gave no details on the circumstances surrounding his death but offered condolences to his relatives and said the diplomat had died a day before his 65th birthday. 
More details soon …
